website_summaries.verdict: A nicely fitting all-around recreational skate, with accurate foot sizing, that is ready to hit the ice right away.
pros: Very good for beginners and casual skaters putting in just a couple of hours a week on the rink
cons: Ankle support is not good for skaters wanting to do more advanced moves
Shoes usually need to be ordered one size down, and may need heat sizing

customer_reviews.title: These skates offer no support whatsoever so unless you are looking for a way to waste 80 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Ignore any positive reviews you see of these skates. They use a mounting method that isn’t even used anymore. The weld is so week it broke after three weeks of LIGHT use. These skates offer no support whatsoever so unless you are looking for a way to waste 80 dollars, save your money and buy Jackson’s.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Raquet

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Beginning-Level Ice Skates
customer_reviews.text: I love my new ice skates. Very comfortable, sturdy, and elegant. Note: despite being advertised as “pre-sharpened,” you will want to have them sharpened before wearing on the ice. I advanced from Adult 1 to Adult 5 in about three months with a lot of determination and practice, but now have to upgrade my ice skates since these are not designed for intricate edge work, spinning, or jumping. They were great to learn beginning ice skating and I am still very happy to have chosen these as my first pair of ice skates.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Maybury

customer_reviews.title: Perfect skates!
customer_reviews.text: I love these skates! I usually wear size 7.5 but these only come in 7 or 8. I got size 8 and they fit perfect so if you are 7.5 I’d suggest getting an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Pony

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter is delighted with the Skates
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is delighted with the Skates. She loves how they feel inside, how easy they are to put them on and take them off.She is just a beginner and just started skating so we don't know how good they might be for jumps or tricks but to start skating they are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: INAKI ALDAZABAL

customer_reviews.title: Great for skilled figure skaters
customer_reviews.text: I had a very small pair of ice skates which I learned to skate with. These skates allow more skilled figure skaters to do more tricks and skate easier. However, if you are just learning how to skate, these skates may not be the best choice. As a skater with experience, I say that they are great, are very comfortable (I have a high arch and a wide foot, so this actually surprised me!), and great quality. Their price is pretty standard, which is just fine with me. Overall, they are very nice ice skates.
customer_reviews.author: Ginbit

customer_reviews.title: I love my skates !
customer_reviews.text: I love my skates! I wear a 10 but went down to a 9
customer_reviews.author: MajesticalMess

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and she hasn't skated with them yet,But they fit her perfectly. She wears and 8 shoe so I got her the size 7 skate-PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: MGS

customer_reviews.title: Not made in Minnesota
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy another pair of skates that were also recommended, but settled for these as I thought they were made in America. I was disappointed when I saw that they were made in China. Their website does not disclose this information. I had checked and thought they were selling a made in America product, for those that care of country of origin. The skates themselves seem fine. I just received today and plan to skate next week with them, unless I decide to return and order the Botas Stella Skates instead.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ormond

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and she really likes them. She was able to skate with them without having to get them sharpened although she is a beginner and anything is better than rental skates.
customer_reviews.author: SonicD007

customer_reviews.title: Great starter skate
customer_reviews.text: Daughter really liked. Good economical purchase when dealing with a child who you are not sure is going to stay in lessons. After she outgrows these (and if she is still interested) we will probably upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: RedRen

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of skates for a beginner: no matter what their age.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 21 year old son who had never been on ice skates before (sad because we live in Wisconsin). He and his girlfriend went skating Christmas night, and they have been going every day since. These were not the most expensive skates, but the quality and craftsmanship are great. I would definitely recommend this product for a beginning skater.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality at a good price. Stiff enough to do some tricks. I had purchased several different skates and returned them because they were POOR quality. I would recommend these for a recreational skater who is still a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine G.

customer_reviews.title: Quality fine but looks leave a little to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be fine, but very bulky, like a rollerblading boot ball the slim streamlined ice skates. And though I thought they looked great, when she wears them with more advanced skaters she looks babyish with the bulk and not tan heel like everyone else has. Wouldn’t recommend based on asthmatics only.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Good for recreation, not for learning.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful skates if you’re not looking to learn any figure skating moves. Already looking at buying a better pair with more support because these have NONE! Don’t get for adults even if you’re learning basics, get at least 40 support so your ankles won’t bend and hurt. Other than that. For recreation skates they’re great! Or for children learning to skate. A good first pair if you’re just learning how to not fall!
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner skate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a beginning skater, but the states are working out great so far. She has had them about 2 months. They do not come sharpened so I have them sharpened at the rink for $10. The inside is much more cushioned than the rental skates and she has more confidence. We did have to go up a size from her street shoes.
customer_reviews.author: HoustonFam

customer_reviews.title: Love these skates!
customer_reviews.text: Size fit perfectly and they are great quality for beginner skaters!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect. It’s important to go to the company website and print out the template for measuring your foot. They have their own sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 7 when I'm a 7 1/2 because I was advised by a figure skater to go smaller for better control. As it was a little tight in the toes, they still fit beautifully, and I loved skating on the ice with these. They felt more reliable than basic rental skates and glided nicely on smooth ice. I advise to get the blades sharpened before ice skating once you get them
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cheap start with trusted band.
customer_reviews.text: I find, at least for the men's version, this skate is rather true to size. I wear a 9.5 US men's for most shoes. I ordered a 10. It fits great. Just enough toe roe to be comfortable, but not loose enough for my feet to slide around. They are sharpened enough for a good test run, but will probably need resharpining before anything serious. These things are a little stiff at first. So if you can get your skates baked I would. A blow dryer could kind of work, as some do. But it'll fit better with a professional bake. Nice, cheap enough for someone getting back into skating who knows rentals are the devil.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dole

customer_reviews.title: The skates are comfortable and good support to ankle comparing to rental skates
customer_reviews.text: Although the skates came pre-sharpened, I have to sharpen them again before skating on ice. The skates are comfortable and good support to ankle comparing to rental skates.
customer_reviews.author: unit1

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTLY LEATHER
customer_reviews.text: WOW! LEATHER AND PERFECT FIT! I had a very very difficult time finding leather boots. Everything is stuff, inflexible, over-stuffed plastic! These skates, however, are just what my granddaughter needed. She is trying everything and having great ice skating adventures !
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: I love love love theses skates
customer_reviews.text: I love love love theses skates. Arrived in perfect condition. I like for my skates to fit a little tight so my feet won't move around when I skate so I ordered one size down. The blade comes sharpened and it brings a guard but a very flimsy one. Overall the product is awsome and for the price it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: mari

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says they are very comfortable and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie King

customer_reviews.title: Good casual skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates so that I could occasionally skate at my local rink. These are good for beginners and provides minimal ankle support. The padding is also a bit on the thin side.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Initially fine but the blade broke away from the skate after ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially fine but the blade broke away from the skate after 4 months of recreational use. I expected better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great brand. Used to buy it when my daughter was in figure skating. Bought this pair for recreational use because of the brand. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rozzell

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: These felt good on the ice. I’m a beginner skater but I’m happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She says that they feel good. Better than the rentals. She's a casual skater, about 2 times a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: At least two sizes smaller than they say. I wear 12 , bought that and couldn’t get foot halfway in skate.
customer_reviews.author: Justice 4 All

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift and the person that is using them loves them after she had the blades sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: lvmrmom

customer_reviews.title: She loved them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my girlfriend, and she loved them. They quality is great, and she said they are very comfortable. I am glad I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: ORLANDO SOLORIO

customer_reviews.title: Very good ice skates
customer_reviews.text: Very good skates ,very comfortable,but you need to get them sharpened when u recieve them . Came very fast . I recommend u getting these .also has nice color inside it's a nice blue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just wow. These are the perfect skates for this price range. They look and feel like the best skates ever. Great padding, durable, and like I said before just are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I am a beginner skater and these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: great skates for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: size and design are great for my seven year old. she has skated with these twice so far and they are comfortable and easy to put on/take off without adult help. overall thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JoAn In NYC

customer_reviews.title: Blade snapped at the weld.
customer_reviews.text: The right skate's blade cleanly snapped off at the weld. Thankfully it happened while i was stepping off the ice and I wasn't seriously injured. I had my local skate shop look at it and its unfixable. Buyer's beware. These skates are cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ametrano

customer_reviews.title: Must wear with tall socks.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 sneaker, got a 9 skate. Fits well. The inside are pretty rough around the top, must wear with taller socks.
customer_reviews.author: Janet N. English

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, exept for the hooks
customer_reviews.text: it fits, but the hook for the laces popped off and broke. The metal on it just chipped off, but i use the hole to put my laces through. Overall good, exept for the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: atomicfox

customer_reviews.title: These are great skates
customer_reviews.text: They are great fitting! I was kind of nervous about the sizing but I got my regular size and fit great. They are comfortable and not too tight. Love everything about them so far. These are my first pair of skates so I don’t have anything else to compare them to but my opinion, great skates !
customer_reviews.author: Tyanah Quezada

customer_reviews.title: Great value for ir the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for ir the money. My daughter loves them. They came pre sharpened. Also purchased the skate guards. We'll see now they hold up. They are very comfortable. Size 6 was perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: KariD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and met all expectations . Size was just right!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Shulman

customer_reviews.title: Fits great after LIGHTLY baking them with a heat gun
customer_reviews.text: Fits great after LIGHTLY baking them with a heat gun. Be careful with the heat gun you can melt the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: These skates have been working great for my daughters lessons. They give good support for her ankles
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful skates! My daughter loves them and skates well ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful skates! My daughter loves them and skates well in them
customer_reviews.author: Sspirk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Skates
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, strong, great support, well crafted skates. These are better quality than anything you can buy in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Nahh

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting skate
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting skate. Great support. Made a huge difference from rental skates. Would size down if you are a 1/2-size. I am a 7 or 7 1/2. I ordered a 7 and they were great if not a little roomy with thin socks
customer_reviews.author: PayCayH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The size was right according to their chart, it's comfy and sturdy. It's not pre sharpended
customer_reviews.author: mohammed qurashi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these skates. They fit as expected and have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! They are used weekly for about two hours. Holding up well to teenage use!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the first 2 years of figure skate. Loved them
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Good skates
customer_reviews.text: Great skates for the price. These have good support and are well made, and they are aesthetically pleasing. They are not, however, presharpened as stated. I did order a size down and I can still wear them with my wool socks, so they do run a size large.
customer_reviews.author: JRF

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Terrible skates that feel like hard plastic when lacing them up. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower75

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, fits the size I wanted, came fast.
customer_reviews.author: Palogirl5

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: They skate beautifully.. I used them at an ice skating rink when I was visiting my best friend and when I got back home I knew that I just had to have them. The blades glide great against the ice, has wonderful support, I could wear them for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great for beginner skaters and takes a few days to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size is NOT equal to shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I have not skated in these yet but they do feel comfortable when trying them on. Especially for the price. Stiff and sturdy but cushioned around the ankle. SIZE: I wear a women’s 8 in shoes and 7.5 in boots. I ordered a 7 in these skates based on other reviews. They fit snug (not too snug) with normal socks although I’m assuming they will stretch slightly with use. **Blade covers were purchased septately** Boxing was a disappointment. They were not in the original box. These were NOT sharpened. Wherever you plan on skating they usually have a sharpening center there. Make sure to specify they are for recreational/figure skating. Whatever you’re planning on doing.
customer_reviews.author: FurMom23

customer_reviews.title: Blades not sharpened
customer_reviews.text: Boots seemed good but blades where completely flat, not sharpened as advertised
customer_reviews.author: anna coopersmith

customer_reviews.title: otherwise it is a nice pair of skates
customer_reviews.text: The blades were not sharpened, otherwise it is a nice pair of skates!
customer_reviews.author: bananafish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with these skates. Nice as rentals, good look. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan KILIAN

customer_reviews.title: Don’t follow the size chart !
customer_reviews.text: I tried using the sizing chart but according to the reviews ordering near shoe size was the correct way. Had I ordered to the sizing chart they would of been way to small! My daughter wears a size size 8 shoe, foot measures 9 1/3 inch. I ordered her a 7 as reviews stated and the skate just fits, maybe a little snug with a thicker sock. I wish there were half sizes- maybe with wear they will loosen up because that is a very stiff boot! Also the strings are not long enough
customer_reviews.author: rhp2003

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice, though they come sharpened it is not long until you have to get them sharpened again..
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my daughter. She absolutely LOVES them!
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good quality for an advanced beginner (used 1x per week for 1-2 hours at a time)
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical after reading reviews on these skates, but so far, they have been comfortable on my daughter (she hasn't complained) and seem to provide just the right amount of ankle support and cushioning. We were unsure as to whether they came sharpened or not, and the skating place where she takes lessons said they needed sharpening, so we went ahead and had that done. No problems so far for skates for an advanced beginner!
customer_reviews.author: Monica W. Munn-Schreml

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the best ice skates our 9 year old daughter has had
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best ice skates our 9 year old daughter has had. She is picky and likes her skates/shoes tight and skates for hours at a time. These were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: I have not skated in years and was worried I couldn't find comfortable skates. These skates are very comfortable and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissab

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE for figure skating.
customer_reviews.text: These skates are for recreational skating o n l y. These are NOT for figure skating what so ever. I got these as a cheap skate better than rentals, and they broke down by their 3rd use. At the time I was using them I was only doing basic moves like one-foot glide, basic pivots (one toe pick in the ice, and you twirl around it with the other.) There is a small toe-pick, not apt for jumps of any kind, and the ankle support is so flimsy I nearly broke my ankle many times. It is an okay skate for just going forward and backward, but anything beyond that will destroy the skate within days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives them and she says they feel great too. They arrived a few days early too.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and feel to the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and feel to the shoe. The blade seems to have a strange sharpening profile and front bur seems too low.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: My daughter works at ice rink. Her old skates were falling apart. She loves these and says they are good quality and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: PCMOM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and beautiful. I got exactly what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: carol galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic skates.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I took the chance on the size since I could return them. I wear a ladies size 10 in street shoes but needed a 9 in ice skates. They fit snug but good and after a couple of uses are very comfortable for basic skating. They are head-and-shoulders above the horrible rental skates I had been using for my daughter's weekly skating sessions. They've probably paid for themselves by now as well in not renting.
customer_reviews.author: ZippetyDooDa

customer_reviews.title: ... rink for 7 years now and ordered this and love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've been skating forever and have worked at the local rink for 7 years now and ordered this and love them!!! I'm normally a 7.5 and ordered a 7. They fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Csummers

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our daughter and they are perfect!! Great quality. She loves them. Says they were comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I order a 5 size skates, but I receive a 4 size skates, plz change it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I'm no professional, but I absolutely love these skates. Very comfortable, very good looking; and definitely quality made. 5/5 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Grace P Brummel

customer_reviews.title: surprised & happy!
customer_reviews.text: im a size 11 & sometimes 12 in womens & these fit perfectly! surprised & happy!
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: ... has already told me that I need skates with better ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I am taking Adult 2 skating lessons in the US and my instructors has already told me that I need skates with better ankle support. She says that a beginner figure skate of decent quality will cost at least $120. So do not purchase these, you will just need to buy a better pair later.
customer_reviews.author: Anna!

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: While I have not yet had a chance to put these to use on the ice, I am super pleased with the easy of getting these on and comfort. I tried the Softec skates and the ones that go high up the past ankle well up the calf and just found them really uncomfortable. I wanted a traditional skate - like what I grew up with - but more comfortable. These also happen to be beautiful. I am not much of a skater, but hope these will get me out on the ice with my child.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: I feared they were to big but with thicker socks they fit better than I had anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 7.5 in regular shoes but normally I wear a 6 in boots so I ordered the 6. I feared they were to big but with thicker socks they fit better than I had anticipated. Will be wearing them to the rink tonight. We'll see how they do.
customer_reviews.author: HikaBaby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The size does not same what I rent in the skating place.
customer_reviews.author: wayneinch

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered the same ice skates previously (smaller size) for my daughter and she used them for 1 1/2 years. Have held up well through about 20 times skating. Comfortable to wear for 1-2 hours (as long as we typically go skating) without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality with this price for beginners. My daughter loves this pair. Compare to other players special booked ice skate, this pair is as good as the two hundred dollars one.
customer_reviews.author: Anne J

product_meta.title: Riedell Skates - 110 Opal - Recreational Ice Skates with Stainless Steel Spiral Blade for Men
feature_bullets: GIVES YOU OPTIMAL SUPPORT - This figure skate set offers light support to keep you stable on the ice while allowing for freedom of movement. These boots have a split tongue design to provide support and add comfort. Support rating is 20 (Scale 1-100)

STAYS COMFORTABLE FOR ENDLESS USE - These modern figure skates have a comfortable design and a simple lacing system. These soft figure skates have a foam quarter padding to provide extra comfort for carefree skating. Check Sizing Chart for best fit.

ULTRA DURABLE & MAN-MADE - These beginner/recreational ice skates use high-quality vinyl and materials to ensure long-lasting use. Built with added reinforcement, these boots and blades will keep you skating all-day.

DESIGNED TO KEEP YOU SAFE & YOUR FEET DRY - These beginner ice skates have safety in mind by featuring quilted linings for cushion. Designed with a maintenance-free PVC sole, these boots keep your feet comfortable for hours of use.

VERSATILE BLADE FOR ANY USE - These ice shoes come with stainless steel Spiral blades that give you a smooth glide on the ice. By offering great handling and speed, the 110 Opal offers quality performance whether on a rink or on a pond.
